overwrite.description: When saving visualisation functions and file already exists, if 0 it doesn't compute it, if 1 it overwrites it.

hs_compute.description: If compute Hillshade. Parameter for GUIs.

hs_sun_azi.description: Solar azimuth angle (clockwise from North) in degrees.

hs_sun_el.description: Solar vertical angle (above the horizon) in degrees.

mhs_compute.description: If compute Multiple directions hillshade. Parameter for GUIs.

mhs_nr_dir.description: Number of solar azimuth angles (clockwise from North).

mhs_sun_el.description: Solar vertical angle (above the horizon) in degrees.

slp_compute.description: If compute Slope. Parameter for GUIs.

slrm_compute.description: If compute Simple local relief model. Parameter for GUIs.

slrm_rad_cell.description: Radius for trend assessment in pixels.

svf_compute.description: If compute Sky-View Factor. Parameter for GUIs.

svf_noise.description: The level of noise remove [0-don't remove, 1-low, 2-med, 3-high].

asvf_compute.description: If compute Anisotropic Sky-View Factor. Parameter for GUIs.

pos_opns_compute.description: If compute Openness - Positive. Parameter for GUIs.

neg_opns_compute.description: If compute Openness - Negative. Parameter for GUIs.

sim_compute.description: If compute Sky illumination. Parameter for GUIs.

sim_shadow_dist.description: Max shadow modeling distance in pixels.

ld_compute.description: If compute Local dominance. Parameter for GUIs.

ld_min_rad.description: Minimum radial distance (in pixels) at which the algorithm starts with visualization computation.

ld_max_rad.description: Maximum radial distance (in pixels) at which the algorithm ends with visualization computation.

ld_anglr_res.description: Angular step for determination of number of angular directions.

ld_observer_h.description: Height at which we observe the terrain.
